custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND [$STATUS$] AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.status = ?) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (expirationDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey) WHERE AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL

SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN ResourcePermission ON (ResourcePermission.companyId = JournalArticle.companyId) AND (ResourcePermission.name = 'com.liferay.journal.model.JournalArticle') AND (ResourcePermission.primKeyId = JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey) AND (ResourcePermission.scope = ?) WHERE ResourcePermission.primKey IS NULL
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND (reviewDate >= ?) AND (reviewDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (resourcePrimKey = ?) AND (displayDate <= ?) AND (status = 0) AND (indexable = [$TRUE$]) ORDER BY version DESC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title FROM JournalArticleLocalization WHERE 1 = ? GROUP BY JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title ) JournalArticleLocalization ON (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.status = ?) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN JournalArticleLocalization ON (1 = ?) AND (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) AND (JournalArticleLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.status = ?) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN JournalArticleLocalization ON (1 = ?) AND (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) AND (JournalArticleLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title FROM JournalArticleLocalization WHERE 1 = ? GROUP BY JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title ) JournalArticleLocalization ON (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN JournalArticleLocalization ON (1 = ?) AND (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) AND (JournalArticleLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title FROM JournalArticleLocalization WHERE 1 = ? GROUP BY JournalArticleLocalization.companyId, JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK, JournalArticleLocalization.title ) JournalArticleLocalization ON (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN JournalArticleLocalization ON (1 = ?) AND (JournalArticle.companyId = JournalArticleLocalization.companyId) AND (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) AND (JournalArticleLocalization.languageId = ?) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalFeed.*} FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY feedId ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$])) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT JournalArticle.folderId AS modelFolderId, JournalArticle.articleId AS articleId, JournalArticle.version AS version, 0 AS modelFolder, JournalArticle.displayDate AS displayDate, JournalArticle.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT JournalArticle.groupId AS groupId, JournalArticle.articleId AS articleId, MAX(JournalArticle.version) AS version FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$])) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$] GROUP BY JournalArticle.groupId, JournalArticle.folderId, JournalArticle.articleId ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.groupId = JournalArticle.groupId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.articleId = JournalArticle.articleId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.version = JournalArticle.version)

SELECT JournalArticle.folderId AS modelFolderId, JournalArticle.articleId AS articleId, JournalArticleLocalization.title AS title, JournalArticle.version AS version, 0 AS modelFolder, JournalArticle.displayDate AS displayDate, JournalArticle.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT JournalArticle.groupId AS groupId, JournalArticle.articleId AS articleId, MAX(JournalArticle.version) AS version FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$])) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$] GROUP BY JournalArticle.groupId, JournalArticle.folderId, JournalArticle.articleId ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.groupId = JournalArticle.groupId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.articleId = JournalArticle.articleId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.version = JournalArticle.version) LEFT JOIN JournalArticleLocalization ON (JournalArticle.id_ = JournalArticleLocalization.articlePK) AND (JournalArticleLocalization.languageId = ?)
SELECT {JournalFolder.*} FROM JournalFolder LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = JournalFolder.folderId) WHERE AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, '' AS articleId, 0 AS version, 1 AS modelFolder, JournalFolder.createDate AS displayDate, JournalFolder.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, '' AS articleId, JournalFolder.name AS title, 0 AS version, 1 AS modelFolder, JournalFolder.createDate AS displayDate, JournalFolder.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]
